data.text: Dɔɔi ɠa ga ɲɛɛɠulasu anii, kpɔɔle anii é nu ɠaazulatisu, toɠa ga zɔɔlɛma anii,
Masagi a yiiɠaawanana, maa ɠa ɗa yiki eɠɛ zalai zikɔ wooi,
Nu maaɠooza sakpegi ʋa, naa ɠa ga lɛbiya vaa.
Dɔɔʋɛ nui la ɠɛ kɛɛni, é ʋa wozai woli ma yeeɠɛɠalai,
Kisiɛiti ti nuɓusɛi yiimaʋɛ, ta ga ziɛi buuzeiɗai,
Nu mɔinmɔin ka ɗa ná-wooɠɛɠiladai zulɛ,
Telebo nui ɠa ziɛzu ná-sɔledai zu,
Siɛgi zu masagi zeizu la tukpɔɠaaleʋezuʋɛ,
Ɓɛ ɠa a zoo é ɠɛ ma: «Zìimaʋɛ ɠoleʋɛ na,
Nu kiloi ta kɔɠɔ ganii ma zii felegɔiti seɠe, é ʋa nuiti yaava,
Zunu loungoi ɠa ɗa ɓɔɠɔ ɠɛʋele lɛ ga ná-kɛɛwotiiti,
Nu woiyeɠei é faa mɛnisu, nu ɠaazuʋɛ é wozaɠaazu,
Mina ɲiimɛnii wola nɛɛ ʋɛ, è mina gaaɓela baladai zu.
Ani ɠeya nui ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ma: «É la ʋani! É la ʋani!»
Zanugi ma vaa la ɓaani, kɔbu ani ʋagɔi mɔinʋɛ,
Ni nui ta a ɓɔɠɔ ɠɛna ga zeelaga è ʋɔ bɛ, é ʋilɛ nui ta ná-kuye vaa ʋa, nii è la kwɛɛ,
Daamianigi unmaai, mɔunpa toɠa ɗa nɛɛ,
Faiti ti ɠazaʋisu, ti laa ɠa ɗa zeeli ga tɛnɛ pagɔiti maaʋele.
Zɔi é fama ɓɔɛi vazasu, naa ɠa dɔɔɠuzu vaiti kulazu.
Zɔi a kɛɛɠɛ voovo ta dee,
Poganii sɔlɔɔgai ga gaazuvilɛi mɔunpagi zu,
Mina ɠɛ ma: «Nà nɔ̀nɔ ʋotokula!»
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaɲɛɛ ɠa ga kɔɠɔ ganii daa la zeelini,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é losu nui luɠɔ ná-eteai zu.
Polu la ʋani nui ma, è ʋa ani ve Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ ga gaazuvilɛi,
Ɠima masagi ɠa ɗa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti so,
Nui ná-faaɠaaɠaa ɠigi ɠa ga lanboi, nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI feai,
Nuɓɔɠɔlai ta wooɠɛɠiladai ɠa a ɗa masagi makɛ,
Zɛbɛi ɠa é ga buzeɠe niinɛgiti ta-ʋadai,
Maawana ʋalai ɠa ga faa ɲɔi ɠɛdɛ salei,
